summary: The only friend Jim can get is the only friend he really doesn't want, the fat boy called Pitbullterje. But for the first time in life he will experience that a friend can be both easy and difficult to cope with.
cast: Petrus Andreas Christensen|Jørgen Foss|Robert Lindahl Haug|Vetle Næss|Charlotte Brode|Rosa Engebrigtsen Bye|Kristin Skogheim|Atle Antonsen|Andreas Cappelen|Nina Engelund|Martin Anda|Mina Marlen Apalvik|Michell Blekkan|Liv Johanne Hjortdal|Irja Martine Linderud Skabo|Lina Dahlen|Ane S. Jensen
title: Pitbullterje
